name: Revenge of Toxic Frog
description: Everyone&#39;s favorite Little Frog is back in Revenge of Toxic Frog! You&#39;re in for a wild and whacky ride as the Jungle Pond breaks loose into pure mayhem! Hop your frog over hundreds of lily pads as you follow the compass to hunt down the Masks of Revenge. Face all kinds of new and familiar jungle dangers as you tackle 24 challenging rounds of firefly munching fun. Track your frog and share your score with multiple local high score boards, Game Center Leaderboards and tons of Amphibious Achievements. For the grand finale, unlock two awesome endless hopper modes for enough fun to satisfy the Little Frog in everyone!
